    wl proportion according to annual report

    the annual report proportion

    pra_group <- cut(rawdata$recip_pra,
                 c(0, 20, 40, 60, 80, 100),
                 include.lowest = TRUE,
                 right = FALSE)
round(table(pra_group)/length(pra_group), 2)
#> pra_group
#>   [0,20)  [20,40)  [40,60)  [60,80) [80,100] 
#>     0.82     0.05     0.03     0.02     0.05

round(table(rawdata$recip_blgroup)/length(rawdata$recip_blgroup), 2)
#> 
#>    A   AB    B    O 
#> 0.39 0.05 0.12 0.44

cat("Previous grafts")
#> Previous grafts
round(table(rawdata$recip_graftno - 1)/length(rawdata$recip_graftno), 2)
#> 
#>    0    1    2 
#> 0.93 0.07 0.00

age_group <- cut(rawdata$recip_age,
                 c(0, 45, 55, 65, 100),
                 include.lowest = TRUE,
                 right = FALSE)
round(table(age_group)/length(age_group), 2)
#> age_group
#>   [0,45)  [45,55)  [55,65) [65,100]

    Pra group

    raw_recip_matrix <- raw_recip_matrix[!is.na(raw_recip_matrix$recip_pra), ]

raw_recip_matrix$pra_group <- cut(raw_recip_matrix$recip_pra,
                                  c(0, 20, 40, 60, 80, 100),
                                  include.lowest = TRUE,
                                  right = FALSE)

cat("Allocation proportion")
#> Allocation proportion
round(table(raw_recip_matrix$pra_group)/length(raw_recip_matrix$pra_group), 2)
#> 
#>   [0,20)  [20,40)  [40,60)  [60,80) [80,100] 
#>     0.84     0.05     0.03     0.02     0.05


pra_group_prob <- c(0.65, 0.09, 0.07, 0.06, 0.13)
names(pra_group_prob) <- levels(pra_group)

cat("Waiting list proportion")
#> Waiting list proportion
pra_group_prob
#>   [0,20)  [20,40)  [40,60)  [60,80) [80,100] 
#>     0.65     0.09     0.07     0.06     0.13

    State group

    cat("Waiting list proportion")
#> Waiting list proportion
state_prob <- round(c(531, 340, 106, 56, 42)/1075, 2)
names(state_prob) <- c("NSW", "VIC", "QLD", "SA", "WA")
round(table(raw_recip_matrix$recip_state)/length(raw_recip_matrix$recip_state), 2)
#> 
#>  NSW  QLD   SA  VIC   WA 
#> 0.28 0.20 0.11 0.32 0.08
    weightedSampleRecipient <- function(recip_matrix,
                                    prob,
                                    num_recip_size = 3000,
                                    seed = NULL) {

    if (!all(names(prob) %in% colnames(recip_matrix))) {
        stop("prob must be a list with names exist in the recip_matrix column names")
    }

    if (!is.null(seed)) {
        set.seed(seed)
    }

    grid_prob <- do.call(expand.grid, prob)
    grid_prob <- grid_prob[, 1] * grid_prob[, 2] * grid_prob[, 3]
    grid_prob <- cbind(do.call(expand.grid, lapply(prob, names)),
                       prob = grid_prob)

    grid_prob$num <- round(grid_prob$prob * num_recip_size)
    #grid_prob$Var3 <- as.character(grid_prob$Var3)
    recip_matrix_subset <- c()
    for (i in 1:nrow(grid_prob)) {

        keep <- sapply(1:length(prob), function(j) {
            recip_matrix[, names(prob)[j]] %in% grid_prob[i, names(prob)[j]]
        })

        tmp <- recip_matrix[apply(keep, 1, all), ]
        num_tmp <- min(grid_prob[i, "num"], nrow(tmp))
        tmp <- tmp[sample(1:nrow(tmp), size = num_tmp), ]
        recip_matrix_subset <- rbind(recip_matrix_subset, tmp)
    }

    return(recip_matrix_subset)


}

#10 times 
recip_sample_list=list()
seedss=11:20
cl <- parallel::makeCluster(20)
doParallel::registerDoParallel(cl)
recip_sample_list<- foreach(i = 1:10) %dopar% {
  weightedSampleRecipient(raw_recip_matrix,list(pra_group = pra_group_prob,
                                                               recip_state = state_prob,
                                                               recip_blgroup = blood_group_prob),seed=seedss[i])
}

    10*2 results

    
sdm2_fun=function(recip_dt){
  result=KidneyAllocation::runSimulation5.4(recip_dt, 
                                 raw_donor_matrix,
                                 algorithm_FUN = KidneyAllocation::allocation_national,
                                 eligible_FUN = KidneyAllocation::selectionpool1.2,
                                 matching_FUN = KidneyAllocation::dmNational_top,
                                 waitlist_FUN = KidneyAllocation::dynamic_waitlist,
                                 state_algorithm = TRUE,
                                 national_algorithm_threshold = 54000000,
                                 state_algorithm_FUN = KidneyAllocation::Australia_state_algorithm,
                                 state_eligible_FUN = KidneyAllocation::Australia_state_selectionpool,
                                 state_matching_FUN = KidneyAllocation::dmState_top,
                                 eligible_arg = list(AB_priority = TRUE),
                                 waitlist_arg = list(waitlist_Risk = FALSE),
                                 resampleN = 1,
                                 verbose = FALSE,
                                 num_donor = 800,num_recip = 300,
                                 state_balance = TRUE,
                                 dynamic_waitlist = TRUE, 
                                 National_II = TRUE)
  return(result)}

sdm3_fun=function(recip_dt){
  result=KidneyAllocation::runSimulation5.4(recip_dt, 
                                 raw_donor_matrix,
                                 algorithm_FUN = KidneyAllocation::allocation_national,
                                 eligible_FUN = KidneyAllocation::selectionpool1.2,
                                 matching_FUN = KidneyAllocation::dmNational_choice,
                                 waitlist_FUN = KidneyAllocation::dynamic_waitlist,
                                 state_algorithm = TRUE,
                                 national_algorithm_threshold = 54000000,
                                 state_algorithm_FUN = KidneyAllocation::Australia_state_algorithm,
                                 state_eligible_FUN = KidneyAllocation::Australia_state_selectionpool,
                                 state_matching_FUN = KidneyAllocation::dmState_choice,
                                 eligible_arg = list(AB_priority = TRUE),
                                 waitlist_arg = list(waitlist_Risk = FALSE),
                                 resampleN = 1,
                                 verbose = FALSE,
                                 num_donor = 800,num_recip = 300,
                                 state_balance = TRUE,
                                 dynamic_waitlist = TRUE, 
                                 National_II = TRUE)
  return(result)}

                                 state_algorithm = TRUE,
                                 national_algorithm_threshold = 54000000,
                                 state_algorithm_FUN = KidneyAllocation::Australia_state_algorithm,
                                 state_eligible_FUN = KidneyAllocation::Australia_state_selectionpool,
                                 state_matching_FUN = KidneyAllocation::select_max,
                                 eligible_arg = list(AB_priority = TRUE),
                                 waitlist_arg = list(waitlist_Risk = FALSE),
                                 resampleN = 1,
                                 verbose = FALSE,
                                 num_donor = 800,num_recip = 300,
                                 state_balance = TRUE,
                                 dynamic_waitlist = TRUE, 
                                 National_II = TRUE)
  return(result)}

noyearwl_fun=function(recip_dt){
  result=KidneyAllocation::runSimulation5.4(recip_dt, 
                                 raw_donor_matrix,
                                 algorithm_FUN = KidneyAllocation::allocation_national,
                                 eligible_FUN = KidneyAllocation::selectionpool1.2,
                                 matching_FUN = KidneyAllocation::select_max,
                                 waitlist_FUN = KidneyAllocation::dynamic_waitlist,
                                 state_algorithm = TRUE,
                                 national_algorithm_threshold = 54000000,
                                 state_algorithm_FUN = KidneyAllocation::Australia_state_algorithm,
                                 state_eligible_FUN = KidneyAllocation::Australia_state_selectionpool,
                                 state_matching_FUN = KidneyAllocation::select_max,
                                 eligible_arg = list(AB_priority = TRUE),
                                 waitlist_arg = list(waitlist_Risk = FALSE, yearly_scale_in = rep(1, 20) , yearly_scale_out = rep(1,20)),
                                 resampleN = 1,
                                 verbose = FALSE,
                                 num_donor = 800,num_recip = 300,
                                 state_balance = FALSE,
                                 dynamic_waitlist = TRUE, 
                                 National_II = TRUE)
  return(result)}

cl <- parallel::makeCluster(20)
doParallel::registerDoParallel(cl)
# simresult1<- foreach(i = 1:10) %dopar% {sdm2_fun(recip_sample_list[[i]])}
# saveRDS(simresult1,"weightedscore_rlist.rds")

simresult2<-foreach(i = 1:10) %dopar% {sdm3_fun(recip_sample_list[[i]])}
saveRDS(simresult2,"simpledecision_rlist.rds")

simresult3<-foreach(i = 1:10) %dopar% {sdm1_fun(recip_sample_list[[i]])}
saveRDS(simresult3,"nesteddtree_rlist.rds")

simresult4<-foreach(i = 1:10) %dopar% {max_fun(recip_sample_list[[i]])}
saveRDS(simresult4,"selectmax_rlist.rds")

simresult5<-foreach(i = 1:10) %dopar% {algoonly_fun(recip_sample_list[[i]])}
saveRDS(simresult5,"algoonly.rds")

simresult6<- foreach(i = 1:10) %dopar% {algosdm_fun(recip_sample_list[[i]])}
saveRDS(simresult6,"algosdm.rds")

simresult7<- foreach(i = 1:10) %dopar% {nosb_fun(recip_sample_list[[i]])}
saveRDS(simresult7,"nosb.rds")

simresult8 <- foreach(i = 1:10) %dopar% {noyearwl_fun(recip_sample_list[[i]])}
saveRDS(simresult8,"noyearwl.rds")

simresult9<- foreach(i = 1:10) %dopar% {newalgo_fun(recip_sample_list[[i]])}
saveRDS(simresult9,"newalgo.rds")

simresult10<- foreach(i = 1:10) %dopar% {germped_fun(recip_sample_list[[i]])}
saveRDS(simresult10,"germped.rds")

simresult11<- foreach(i = 1:10) %dopar% {sdm2r_fun(recip_sample_list[[i]])}
saveRDS(simresult11,"weightedscore_riskkick.rds")

simresult12<-foreach(i = 1:10) %dopar% {sdm3r_fun(recip_sample_list[[i]])}
saveRDS(simresult12,"simpledecision_riskkick.rds")

parallel::stopCluster(cl)
